subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Power forward Herb Pope has transferred to Seton Hall from New Mexico State. The 6-foot-8 Pope will be eligible to practice with the Pirates this season, but will not play until 2009-10. Pope played in 16 games at New Mexico State last season, averaging 11.1 points and 6.8 rebounds.
